input.sentences: it was a wet day as our group met up to go hiking .
we saw great sights | including a waterfall along the trail .
it was a long trail | but the path was well kept .
after the hike | we settled down for a lunch in the shade .
at the end of the day | we had coffee with our new friends .
output.sentences: The group gathered together at the entrance before starting our morning hike.
The waterfalls along the way were absolutely breathtaking.
Some of the hills were pretty steep but overall the hike was a success
Afterwards, our group sat down with refreshments.
We discussed our favorite sights and where we would like to go next.
